I am trying to draw a cube of a given size in 3D. I thought the following was supposed to work, but the cube does not span from -0.5 to 0.5 in each direction:
```julia> cube = Rect3D(Vec3f0(-0.5, -0.5, -0.5), Vec3f0(1, 1, 1));    # origin, widths

julia> meshscatter([Point3f0(0, 0, 0)], scales=[Vec3f0(1, 1, 1)], marker=cube, limits=Rect3D(Vec3f0(-1, -1, -1), Vec3f0(2, 2, 2)))```
